Header.title: Samuel H. Nelson
Header.paragraph: Welcome! Have a look around to learn more about me, and see some of the cool things I've made!

About.intro: Hi! I’m excited you’re here. I’m always looking to connect with others in tech, so feel free to reach out!
About.paragraph: I'm a first-generation college graduate with AAPI and Native Hawaiian heritage. I'm a natural problem-solver and maker. Whether it’s assembling self-fabricated metal parts or building full-stack web applications. I enjoy learning and am actively expanding my knowledge in Data Structures, Algorithms, and modern web technologies. I’m pursuing a career in tech to combine creativity and technical skill to build impactful, well-crafted software.

text: ● Mood Music: Mobile App For Music Categorization

text: ✔ Developed and deployed full-stack web applications, with modern back-end and front-end technologies for state management and data storage & retrieval.
✔ Leveraged Agile methodology framework and pair programming sessions, fostering teamwork and problem-solving skills throughout the full software development lifecycle (SDLC).
✔ Designed and utilized RESTful APIs for data communication in full-stack applications.

text: ✔ Utilized excel and proprietary database, ran daily analytics reports, analyzed the data of thousands of client accounts, reviewed mortgage collateral documents, and coordinated with internal Wells Fargo teams.
✔ Cultivated and strengthened working relationships with business clients of Wells Fargo, both small businesses and large corporate clients.
